    public interface HandlerRegistrationCollector
    This is the interface for an object that collects HandlerRegistrations.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addHandlerRegistration(com.google.gwt.event.shared.HandlerRegistration registration)
      This method is to be called with the HandlerRegistration for all permanent handlers.

    • Method Detail

      • addHandlerRegistration

        void addHandlerRegistration(com.google.gwt.event.shared.HandlerRegistration registration)
        This method is to be called with the HandlerRegistration for all permanent handlers. This allows to remove them on disposal.
        Parameters:
        registration - is the HandlerRegistration to add.
